Equity and Access Design Project

Check out this equity and access design project that considers Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles in the context of creating learning experiences for individuals experiencing sensory, motor, and/or hearing impairments. This content was created for a course on diversity, equity, power and inclusion in the University of Southern California's Learning Design & Technology Program at Rossier School of Education.
Download PDF.
